message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  Let's be reasonable, how about a 55/45 split?
Meet me in the middle of our two offers, 57-43 is fair
This is getting us nowhere. I need a bit more to make it worth the lost time. 52/48?
I'll give a bit, but 56-44 is as low as I'll go
Alice, we're running out of time and the inflation is eating away at this deal. I need you to meet me halfway. 51/49, take it or leave it.
